scripts.serve: concurrently "npm run start --prefix Front" "npm run emulators"
scripts.check-env: node -e "const dotenv = require('dotenv'); dotenv.config({ path: './functions/.env' }); const isDevBackend = process.env.IS_DEV === 'false'; dotenv.config({ path: './Front/.env' }); const isDevFrontend = process.env.REACT_APP_IS_DEV === 'false'; if (!isDevBackend || !isDevFrontend) { console.error('Deployment blocked: IS_DEV or REACT_APP_IS_DEV is still set to true'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('Environment check passed'); }"
scripts.predeploy: npm run set-env-dev && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run set-env-prod && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && npm run check-env && firebase deploy
